title: Vorschmack
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon margarine', '1 onion, peeled and finely chopped', '2 to 3 garlic cloves, peeled and crushed', '500g minced beef', '4 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 small tin anchovies', '1/2 beef stock cube', '300ml boiling water', 'freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
